description: A dashboard for visualizing results from the k6.io load testing tool by groups, using the InfluxDB exporter.Based on https://grafana.com/dashboards/10660

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "errors" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.description: Grouped by 1 sec intervals and group name
panels.title: $Measurement (over time per group)

panels.description: Grouped by 1 sec intervals and group name
panels.title: $Measurement (over time per tag)

targets.query: SELECT count("value"), min("value"), median("value"), max("value"), mean("value"), percentile("value", 90) FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE ("group" =~ /^$Group$/ AND "name" =~ /^$Tag$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "group"

list.label: Group
list.name: Group
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "group" WHERE $timeFilter

list.label: Tag
list.name: Tag
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "name" WHERE $timeFilter

title: k6 Load Testing Results By Groups
